title: 速报：香港时间六时二十分美参议院或通过《香港人权与民主法案》【更新：法案已通过！祝福香港！】
contents:
Marco Rubio at Twitter says:


At approximately 5:20pm EST ( 06:20AM in #HongKong ) the U.S. Senate will attempt to pass my Hong Kong Human Rights & Democracy Act by a unanimous vote.

Watch Live Here:
https://t.co/6XM6vktsqY


update:

#HongKong we hear you.

We continue to stand with you.

Tonight, the Senate ✔passed my #HongKongHumanRightsandDemocracyAct

https://t.co/ldUmjYk7yK
